Skills.title: My Skills
Skills.subtitle: Technologies I've been working with recently:

propertyPulse.title: Rent a Property
propertyPulse.description: A website for renting properties with the following features: sign up via Google account, send messages directly to the property owner, favorite preferred properties, view the property's geolocation, among others.

pokedex.title: Pokedex
pokedex.description: An app that allows users to search and explore Pok√©mon, displaying details such as stats. It offers an interactive experience and real-time updates.

coffeeDelivery.title: Coffee Delivery
coffeeDelivery.description: A coffee delivery app created during Rocketseat's Ignite course. It allows users to add coffee to the cart and complete a mock purchase using Stripe (for testing purposes only).
